metadata.name: HackTool - SharpEvtMute DLL Load
metadata.comment: Detects the load of EvtMuteHook.dll, a key component of SharpEvtHook, a tool that tampers with the Windows event logs

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (contains(lower(process.file.hashes.value), lower('imphash=330768a4f172e10acb6287b87289d83b')))

output.summary: Detects the load of EvtMuteHook.dll, a key component of SharpEvtHook, a tool that tampers with the Windows event logs

metadata.objective: False positive: Other DLLs with the same Imphash Reference: https://github.com/bats3c/EvtMute
